channel.title: Requesting a Logo for my Forums and Server plus a Banner
channel.description:
In my mind i dont have a certain "specification" but for the logo and the client i request something that looks like this with editing ofcourse but my server is called "rune-Rage,
[img]http://www.rune-war.net/community/public/style_images/4_380px-RUNEWAR_50.png[/img]
This logo is small but if possible i would like enlarged and imprinted as "Rune-Rage" on the banner and my logo if possible. any more information you need reply here. but for the logo i request it stay the same colours just edited, and to have the edited version imprinted on a banner.
feel free to improvise with the banner apart from adding the logo to it but for the banner i dont really mind about the dimensions aslong a it could fit a forum and a site aswell as the colour i would like it to improvise as i said i dont have any "specifications" for the banner colours,text etc.
Thanks Daniel

item.title: Requesting a Logo for my Forums and Server plus a Banner
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:543937”]
So I tried.
This was done with a font generator, just photoshop’d the last stone out[/quote]

Nice photoshop lol

Read full topic
item.source: Requesting a Logo for my Forums and Server plus a Banner
